CustomField.description: Average number of days it takes to collect payment after a sale has been made, based on the sales and payments made in the last 365 days. The value in this field is automatically calculated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Average number of days it takes to collect payment after a sale has been made, based on the sales and payments made in the last 365 days. The value in this field is automatically calculated.
CustomField.label: Days Sales Outstanding (Annual)
